controls.template: <svg viewBox='0 0 100 100' class='ctrl-radialprogress'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' stroke='#eee' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' stroke='#007bff' stroke-width='10' fill='none' stroke-dasharray='282.743' stroke-dashoffset='{offset}'/></svg>
<video class='ctrl-mediaplayer' controls style='width:100%; height:100%;'><source src='{src}' type='video/mp4'></video>

<iframe class='ctrl-youtube' width='100%' height='100%' src='{src}' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture' allowfullscreen></iframe>
